application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Birch - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, 20% crown thin & deadwood.
decision_conditions: T.1 Birch - Reduce single overextended limb presenting to the upper western canopy and a second overextended limb presenting to the upper North Eastern canopy back to suitable growth points in line with main canopy, 10% crown thin & deadwood.

Given that the Birch in question is a mature specimen which appears never to have received reductive work historically and remains healthy; the works proposed are excessive and due to the species characteristics and the maturity of the tree in combination, may well lead to the tree entering into decline.
